software.name: ninkopik
software.notes:
To open menu, push SELECT when the first title is displayed otherwise the emulated system keeps rebooting.
To skip this software from starting and rebooting your MSX, push SPACE at the first title screen.
Extended BASIC applicable: type CALL CPM, _CPM, CALL COPIMARU, or _COPIMARU to open the menu.
Right/left cursor keys select tape baud rate 1200/2400 respectively.
